# delegate

**Instance Property**

The tab view’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSTabViewDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property must conform to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTabViewDelegate] protocol.

## Handling the Selection of Tabs

- **NSTabViewDelegate**: The `NSTabViewDelegate` protocol defines the optional methods implemented by delegates of `NSTabView` objects.
